additionalNotes: Lure Cigars is a brand inspired by the passion for fishing and the cigars that Lou shared with his father. Each Lure cigar is an invitation to remember those special moments, to enjoy good company and to celebrate life. With Lure Cigars, you can relive the sense of tranquility and connection that is experienced by sharing a cigar and having a good conversation.
